SAINT.Name: Monday of the Third Week of Lent

TROPARION.Header: Troparion of the Prophecy in the 4th Tone

SEXTE.TROPARION: Heal our brokenness, for we are weak and crippled with sin, O Physician of our souls, O Lover of mankind, Who knowest the mind of man.

PROKEIMENON.Header: First Prokeimenon of the Prophecy in the 4th Tone

SEXTE.PROKEIMENON: My prayer unto the God of my life,
I will say unto God: Thou art my helper.
SEXTE.STICHOS: As the hart panteth after the fountains of water, so panteth my soul after Thee, O Lord.

PROKEIMENON.Header: Second Prokeimenon of the Prophecy in the 6th Tone

SEXTE.PROKEIMENON: He is the salvation of my countenance, and my God.
and unto my supplication give ear.
SEXTE.STICHOS: Judge me, O God, and give judgment to my cause.
